name: Giant Skeleton

trait.name: Evasion
text: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
text: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

description:
In the Tomb of Horrors, treasure sometimes presents itself for the taking. In one such location, the "reward" for an attempt to grab some valuables turns out to be the animated skeleton of a giantâ€”deadly not only because of its size and strength, but because it has defenses normally possessed only by undead of much greater power.
Undead Nature . A skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 236, Essentials Kit: Divine Contention, Essentials Kit: Sleeping Dragon's Wake, Infernal Machine Rebuild
